verses.roman:
bhaṅgī kari' jñāna-mārga karila vyākhyāna
krodhāveśe prabhu tāre kaila avajñāna

synonyms: bhaṅgī kari'-doing it in fun; jñāna-mārga—the path of philosophical speculation; karila—did; vyākhyāna—explanation; krodha-āveśe—in the mood of anger; prabhu—the Lord; tāre—to Him; kaila—did; avajñāna—disrespect.
translation: Thus He whimsically began to explain the path of philosophical speculation, and the Lord, in His anger, seemingly disrespected Him.
